about_the_game:
Experience the life of a Magic City detective and become a real expert in the world of magical creatures! Additional locations with a dark, mysterious atmosphere, tricky riddles and numerous hidden objects await you in the bright city of Paris! You will have to not only reveal the truth about Animages disappearance, but learn more about their difficult life. Can a person contain both a human and a beast? Explore an ancient legend, learn how to brew a magical elixir, and make decisions that affect not only the investigation, but also other lives!

The fantasy adventure continues with the additional content "Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon DLC" full of dangerous werewolfs, dark magic experiments and unexpected plot twists. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

✨ MAKE THE LUNAR ELIXIR!
Werewolves need your help more than ever! Gather all the ingredients playing mini-games and learn how to make the lunar elixir.

✨ FIND THE MAGIC HAT!
Explore the enchanting shady alleys and find your companion's magical hat! In return, you will learn some useful information.

✨ LEARN THE ANCIENT LEGEND!
Explore the legend of the Heart of the Beast, through which you will learn more about animages!
